main event: Two incidents of unidentified flying objects were reported in Rolling Meadows, Illinois, with various descriptions of sightings between 1955 and 1965.
interesting points: The objects were initially described as white like hot metal and gray when flattened., Witnesses reported seeing objects in formation, ranging in size from 40 to 60 feet in diameter., The objects changed shapes during the observation and described as moving erratically and then moving upwards., One witness reported driving along when they observed the objects disappearing after approximately 10 minutes of sighting., Various documents were exchanged between the Air Force and witnesses, with suggestions to report sightings through a specific form.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects; described as round and flat.
witness description: Witnesses include civilians reporting extraordinary aerial phenomena.
